title: Which Indian banks support PayPal in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: In India, Bank account can be linked to Paypal only for withdrawing the funds received in their Paypal account. One cannot add funds to their Paypal and make payments using their bank account. All Indian banks are supported by Paypal for withdrawing balance from their Paypal account once their bank account is verified.Only select Debit & Credit cards are supported by Paypal for making payments.
